info.title: Library map index manager.
info.description: Creates and gets map index information for object libraries.

method.name: createLibrary
method.description: Create a new library in the map.

parameter.name: $vcs
parameter.description: The vcs object with the repository loaded.

parameter.name: $innerPath
parameter.description: The inner repository folder path for the map file.

parameter.name: $libName
parameter.description: The library name.

parameter.name: $fileName
parameter.description: The map filename. The default name is the MAP_FILE constant.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: createPackage
method.description: Create a new package in the map.

parameter.name: $vcs
parameter.description: The vcs object with the repository loaded.

parameter.name: $innerPath
parameter.description: The inner repository folder path for the map file.

parameter.name: $libName
parameter.description: The library name.

parameter.name: $packageName
parameter.description: The package name.

parameter.name: $fileName
parameter.description: The map filename. The default name is the MAP_FILE constant.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: createNamespace
method.description: Create a new namespace in the map.

parameter.name: $vcs
parameter.description: The vcs object with the repository loaded.

parameter.name: $innerPath
parameter.description: The inner repository folder path for the map file.

parameter.name: $libName
parameter.description: The library name.

parameter.name: $packageName
parameter.description: The package name.

parameter.name: $nsName
parameter.description: The namespace name.

parameter.name: $parentNs
parameter.description: The parent namespace name (separated by "::", if any).

parameter.name: $fileName
parameter.description: The map filename. The default name is the MAP_FILE constant.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: getMapFilePath
method.description: Gets the map index file path from the repository.

parameter.name: $vcs
parameter.description: The vcs object with the repository loaded.

parameter.name: $innerPath
parameter.description: The inner repository folder path for the map file.

parameter.name: $fileName
parameter.description: The map filename. The default name is the MAP_FILE constant.

method.name: getLibraryList
method.description: Gets all libraries in the map.

parameter.name: $mapFilePath
parameter.description: The map file path.

method.returndescription: An array of library names by key and value.

method.name: getPackageList
method.description: Get all packages from the map file.

parameter.name: $mapFilePath
parameter.description: The map index file path.

parameter.name: $libName
parameter.description: The library name.

method.returndescription: An array of package names by key and value.

method.name: getObjectList
method.description: Get all objects in a library.

parameter.name: $mapFilePath
parameter.description: The map index file path.

parameter.name: $libName
parameter.description: The library name.

method.returndescription: An array of objects. It contains an array for each object with the values: title, name, package, namespace.

method.name: createMapFile

parameter.name: $vcs
parameter.description: The vcs object with the repository loaded.

parameter.name: $innerPath
parameter.description: The inner repository folder path for the map file.

parameter.name: $fileName
parameter.description: The map filename. The default name is the MAP_FILE constant.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: getItemID
method.description: Gets the vcs repository item id.

parameter.name: $seed
parameter.description: The seed for the hash value.
